EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: A New Approach to Big Data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Please join Pivotal on February 17th, for an exclusive Executive Strategy and Product Update <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-live?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data> for press, analysts, customers and partners. This event will take place at the Pivotal San Francisco office from 11:00AM to 12:30PM (PST).
Scott Yara, President and Head of Products and Sunny Madra, Head of Data Products, will unveil Pivotal's groundbreaking new approach and offering that will remove traditional barriers to data-driven innovation. In addition, hear from industry luminaries and customers how these new approaches will accelerate their data and cloud journeys.
We are extending an exclusive invitation to a select group and hope you will join us in person. Space is limited, so please register today <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-live?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data> to secure your spot.
Can't attend in person? Register for the live streaming event.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
